UpdateSourceArgs: /C cd tarkov && rmdir /S /Q node > NUL 2>&1 & rename node-v20.11.1-win-x64 node
-c 'cd tarkov && rm -rf node >/dev/null 2>&1 && tar xfv node-v20.11.1-linux-x64.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1 && mv node-v20.11.1-linux-x64 node >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm node-v20.11.1-linux-x64.tar.gz'
-c 'cd tarkov && rm -rf node >/dev/null 2>&1 && tar xfv node-v20.11.1-linux-arm64.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1 && mv node-v20.11.1-linux-arm64 node >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm node-v20.11.1-linux-arm64.tar.gz'

/C cd tarkov && git clone --branch 3.8.1 https://dev.sp-tarkov.com/SPT/Server.git srv > NUL 2>&1 && cd srv/project && git lfs pull > NUL 2>&1 && set PATH={{$FullRootDir}}node;%PATH% && npm install > NUL 2>&1 && cd "{{$FullBaseDir}}" && del /F /Q Aki.Launcher.exe doorstop_config.ini winhttp.dll SPT.Server.exe > NUL 2>&1 & rd /S /Q EscapeFromTarkov_Data BepInEx "{{$FullRootDir}}srv" > NUL 2>&1 && rename Aki.Server.exe SPT.Server.exe > NUL 2>&1

-c 'cd tarkov && git clone --branch 3.8.1 https://dev.sp-tarkov.com/SPT/Server.git srv >/dev/null 2>&1 && cd srv/project && git-lfs pull >/dev/null 2>&1 && export PATH={{$FullRootDir}}node/bin:$PATH && npm install >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run build:release -- --arch=x64 --platform=linux >/dev/null 2>&1 && \cp -rf build/* "{{$FullBaseDir}}" >/dev/null 2>&1 && cd "{{$FullBaseDir}}" && rm -rf Aki.Launcher.exe EscapeFromTarkov_Data BepInEx doorstop_config.ini winhttp.dll "{{$FullRootDir}}srv" >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x Aki.Server.exe >/dev/null 2>&1 && mv -f Aki.Server.exe SPT.Server.exe >/dev/null 2>&1'

-c 'cd tarkov && git clone --branch 3.8.1 https://dev.sp-tarkov.com/SPT/Server.git srv >/dev/null 2>&1 && cd srv/project && git-lfs pull >/dev/null 2>&1 && export PATH={{$FullRootDir}}node/bin:$PATH && npm install >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run build:release -- --arch=arm64 --platform=linux >/dev/null 2>&1 && \cp -rf build/* "{{$FullBaseDir}}" >/dev/null 2>&1 && cd "{{$FullBaseDir}}" && rm -rf Aki.Launcher.exe EscapeFromTarkov_Data BepInEx doorstop_config.ini winhttp.dll "{{$FullRootDir}}srv" >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x Aki.Server.exe >/dev/null 2>&1 && mv -f Aki.Server.exe SPT.Server.exe >/dev/null 2>&1'
